verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday morning] [V: launched] [ARG1: a barrage of angry tweets slamming Robert Mueller ’s probe into Russian election interference] , [ARGM-ADV: demanding the special counsel to end the investigation] .

President Trump on Sunday morning launched a barrage of [ARG0: angry tweets] [V: slamming] [ARG1: Robert Mueller ’s probe into Russian election interference] , demanding the special counsel to end the investigation .

[ARG0: President Trump] on Sunday morning launched a barrage of angry tweets slamming Robert Mueller ’s probe into Russian election interference , [V: demanding] [ARG2: the special counsel] [ARG1: to end the investigation] .

President Trump on Sunday morning launched a barrage of angry tweets slamming Robert Mueller ’s probe into Russian election interference , demanding [ARG0: the special counsel] to [V: end] [ARG1: the investigation] .
